Hello All,
I had 1.5.4 installed (windows 2000) and it was working fine. When I upgraded 
to 1.5.5 and python2.4, matplotlib quit working. I am getting "Numeric is not 
available
" or something like that (at home I am on linux and synced to cvs!). numpy is 
installed. matplotlib is installed. Anybody able to get matlab plots from 
1.5.5 windows?
Is 1d freely prop flame available in python?
thanks in advance
-osman
